ygData.subject: IGL
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: Dragoon is one bot with two, fused sparks.  That s why he always refers to himself as plural. ... His head tilts to one side at the IGL transmission.

OOC: Dragoon is one bot with two, fused sparks.  That's why he always refers 
to himself as plural.

::Dragoon::
    His head tilts to one side at the IGL transmission.  "Interesting."  He 
sends a message to Magmatron.  "Sir, we are going to this competition.  It 
will be a good test of our new body."  That done he sends a transmission to 
the Otyebis.  "We are Dragoon.  We are signing up for the regular 
competition."
